chawes hamuda niladhariyeki.thanathura leftint karnalwarayeki.ohu hamuda akadamiyata athulath wanne wayasa awurudu 17 diya.ee wana wita ohu deshapalanaya pilibada alpamathra wu deyak dana nositiyeya.wanisiyulawe thibu hamuda pasala wenuwata hamuda wishwa widyalayak idi une me kalayediya.ehidi wishaya nirdeshayada wenas wiya.ee atharata deshapalana widyawada athulathwa thibuni.eyata pem banda chawes lowa pura siti wiplawawadin wu mawo, lenin,kal maks wannawunge lipi kiyewweya.boliwar,napoliyan,klawuswits wani ayage yudhopayan pilibadawada athi kruthida kiyewweya.
